General.Name: China West Construction Group Co Ltd
General.Description: China West Construction Group Co., Ltd engages in the building materials business in China, Malaysia, Indonesia, Cambodia, and internationally. It offers cement, admixtures, commercial mortar, sand, and gravel aggregates. It also is involved in the activities of transportation pumping, scientific research, and testing. The company operates enterprise technology centers in the ready-mixed concrete industry and engineering technology research centers. China West Construction Group Co., Ltd was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

2.Name: Mr. Bin  Lin
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. & Non Independent Director
